author: tmiychao
content: July 5 is **not** a deadline for proposals. The hard deadline is week 5 of the fellowship but it only applies to stipended fellows. Generally we strongly recommend starting to work on the project by week 5

author: tmiychao
content:
<@&857649635274915900> Hope you had a chance to decompress after EthCC and are ready to start a new EPF week! 

Week 4 is here which means we are nearing the first month of the fellowship. By this time you should be finalizing your project proposal and start executing on it. Please open a PR to add your project based on the template to `/projects` directory and use the second table in dev updates file that has dedicated cells for links to your projects. I will provide feedback in the review but feel free to reach out if you have additional questions. 

You can present this and next week at office hours to share your project plan and get extra feedback. Sign up https://github.com/eth-protocol-fellows/cohort-six/issues/113
 And also don't forget to share your regular updates here https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1391677419408326656/1391677429998944348

author: tmiychao
content: <@&857649635274915900> Join us to share your updates, meet fellows and learn cohort news in today's standup! Starting in <t:1751900400:R> at https://meet.ethereum.org/epf-standup
